trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_SEQ_00<tab>Shale is eager to get on with it.

TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_SEQ_01<tab>Shale informs you that she has secured passage to the foundation sector, and that she will accompany you to gather data on the uncharted area. You and your companions head to the government sector, where the lift to Everkeep's depths is located.

TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_SEQ_02<tab>Your party assembles at the lift, and before you board Shale hands you a communicator. The adapter will use the coordinate data it provides to guide you as you delve into Everkeep's depths, where the old castle is said to be preserved.
※To enlist your companion NPCs for this duty, speak with them near the entrance or access Duty Support via the main menu. Use the Duty Finder if you wish to complete the instance alongside fellow players.

TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_SEQ_03<tab>After disembarking the lift and pushing through a sandy area crawling with beasts, the former castle of Alexandria comes into sight. You and your allies approach its timeworn doors, only to be assaulted by mechanized guardians, and during the melee you hear the voice of Calyx beckoning you deeper into the castle, where he intends to further test your combat capabilities. Cutting through more foes, you reach a chamber occupied by an ancient but hostile machine, and after a fierce battle you stand victorious. Shale and Sphene catch up, and together you prepare to search the fortress in earnest.
※In the event that you leave the area, you may return by talking to the lift attendant in the government sector.

TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_SEQ_04<tab>During your exploration of the castle, Sphene reminisces about her time spent there in centuries past─a heartfelt moment interrupted when you both are suddenly transported to a decrepit room. The moldering surroundings are soon replaced by virtual overlays recreating the throne of Alexandria in its former glory. At the center of the chamber are Calyx and the simulant, the former stating that he has one last trial with which to test your mettle, before a hulking mass of metal descends onto the arena. The simulant addresses it as Zelenia, who was second-in-command of Alexandria's royal knights. Overcome with rage at this affront, Sphene begs your aid in destroying the ignoble machine, even though it means you will be playing right into Calyx's hands.
※Recollection can be accessed via the Duty Finder.

TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_SEQ_05<tab>The imitation of Alexandria's finest proves to be a formidable opponent, but yet again you manage to pull through. Calyx seems unperturbed by the destruction of his creation, and appraises you with a look that suggests he possesses knowledge you do not.
※In the event that you leave the area, you may return by speaking with the lift attendant in the government sector.

TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_SEQ_06<tab>Calyx reveals that he covets the key that he might use it to harvest aether from reflections to sustain a growing population of Endless, and in so doing facilitate the evolution of mankind. He then states he will bestow upon you a “gift” before ending the transmission and stripping the room of its illusory grandeur, leaving you and Sphene standing before a dilapidated throne, upon which a tiara rests.

TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_SEQ_07<tab>Although Sphene is torn by the reminder of Zelenia's loss, she is grateful for you striking down the creation that disgraced her memory. As you look around the chamber, it remains unclear just how far into the castle's depths you have been thrust...
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Shale in the government sector.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_TODO_01<tab>Enter the Underkeep.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_TODO_02<tab>Enter the Underkeep.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_TODO_03<tab>Confront Zelenia in Recollection.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_TODO_04<tab>Confront Zelenia in Recollection.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Sphene.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_WUKLAMAT_000_000<tab>At last we have a plan. Let's make it count!
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_GULOOLJA_000_001<tab>According to the records from Yuweyawata, my mother was investigating Origenics for her own research into souls.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_GULOOLJA_000_002<tab>There was map data for Origenics in the records, and that's how we learned about the castle in the foundation sector.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_003<tab>The castle was once my home. I shall do my utmost to be of use on this mission.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_KRILE_000_004<tab>Calyx determines how many will become Endless, but leaves the choice of who in the hands of the people...
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_KRILE_100_004<tab>Is this his idea of fairness, or does he simply not care? Perhaps he considers all to be worthy of salvation...? Oh, but it's too early for such speculation...

TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_GRAHATIA_000_005<tab>In the world of Sphene's memories, the town was already submerged. Given their dire circumstances, I expect the people considered stripping the castle for materials to rebuild.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_GRAHATIA_000_006<tab>For the structure to endure even now... It speaks to its importance to the Alexandrians, as well as their resilience.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_SHALE_000_010<tab>Right. I believe I've plotted a viable route to the foundation sector.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_SHALE_000_011<tab>As we don't have much information on the area, I'll come along and gather geographic data on-site. You can leave the navigating to me.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_GULOOLJA_000_012<tab>I'll stay behind this time, but let me know if there's anything I can do to help!

TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_SHALE_000_013<tab>Oblivion is fortunate to have a capable adapter like you, Gulool Ja. And no matter what the future holds, your knowledge of electrope is bound to serve you well.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_SHALE_000_014<tab>With such dependable support here, we may embark on our mission. Come, let's head to the lift in the government sector.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_GULOOLJA_000_015<tab>Be safe out there!
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_WUKLAMAT_000_016<tab>Oblivion's gotten us permission to use the lift. It's nice when things can move quickly.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_017<tab>From here, we head to the very bottom of Everkeep. I can't help but feel nervous, returning there after so long...
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_GRAHATIA_000_018<tab>Calyx has all but invited us, so we must assume that we are expected...
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_KRILE_000_019<tab>Though it was but from a distance, I remember the sight of Alexandria's castle in the virtual domain. I wonder how it looks now compared to then...
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_GATE05304_000_020<tab>Everything has been arranged for your passage to the foundation sector!
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_SHALE_000_030<tab>There's no direct lift to the foundation sector, so we'll have to transfer to another on the way.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_SHALE_000_031<tab>If we take the wrong lift, we'll end up in the wrong sector, so be sure to follow her instructions.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_SHALE_000_032<tab>According to Teeshal Ja's records, the tower is divided into inner and outer sections below Origenics. The castle is at the heart of the inner section.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_KRILE_000_033<tab>So upon arriving at the foundation sector, we need to make our way inwards.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_SHALE_000_034<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, take this communicator with you.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_SHALE_000_035<tab>It's been modified to track your coordinates, so I'll be guiding you as I collect data.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_WUKLAMAT_000_036<tab>Sounds like we're all set. Let's get going!
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_037<tab>I shall follow close behind with Shale.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_SHALE_000_038<tab>We're heading into a trap, so watch your step.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_GATE05304_000_039<tab>I'll be your guide for the descent to the foundation sector, after which Shale will take over. Please take care not to lose the communicator!
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_Q1_000_040<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_A1_000_001<tab>Small talk.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_A1_000_002<tab>Form a party and enter the Underkeep.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_A1_000_003<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_WUKLAMAT_000_041<tab>Calyx uses the people's love for Sphene to further his own schemes. We can't allow him to do so any longer. Whatever it takes, we'll find and stop him!
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_KRILE_000_042<tab>It would be nice if this foray was uneventful, but that would be a naive hope. Better to expect the worst.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_GRAHATIA_000_043<tab>Though we are taking a risk, the far greater danger would be to wait. This time, let us take the battle to Calyx.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_GATE05304_000_050<tab>Heading below? I'd be glad to show you the way!
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Proceed to the throne room?
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_060<tab>Zelenia was kind, but she could be stern. A pillar of strength when I ascended the throne in troubled times.
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_061<tab>Not only did she protect me, she also buoyed my spirit whenever it threatened to buckle under the pressures of my station...
TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_062<tab>By preserving her memory and honor, you've done more for me than you could know. Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

TEXT_KINGMH106_05304_SYSTEM_100_070<tab>You may now enter the Underkeep with a party of NPC avatars. To make use of this feature, open the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Trust<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> interface located under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu.
